mapper.update: update ecs_consumer set consumer_name = #{consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_sex = #{consumerSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usergroup_id = #{usergroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_phone = #{consumerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where consumer_id = #{consumerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select consumer_id, consumer_name, consumer_sex, usergroup_id, password, consumer_phone, birthday, address, remark from ecs_consumer where consumer_id = #{consumerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select consumer_id, consumer_name, consumer_sex, usergroup_id, password, consumer_phone, birthday, address, remark from ecs_consumer
